title.text: Content Aggregation in Natural Language Hypertext Summarization of OLAP and Data Mining Discoveries

abstractContent.text: We present anew approach to paratactic content aggregation in the context of generating hypertext summaries of OLAP and data mining discoveries.

Two key properties make this approach innovative and interesting: (1) it encapsulates aggregation inside the sentence planning component, and (2) it relies on a domain independent algorithm working on a data structure that abstracts from lexical and syntactic knowledge.
